TextView.android:text: 1) Your selected/saved message and category appears on the top of the screen; 2) Enter a Subject and Rate the Messages' Priority; 3) Use the Add Subject button to add the subject and category to the Database. 5) Use the Write tag button to save message, category, subject and priority level into a NFC TAG; 5) All saved subjects appears into a list on the bottom of device's screen; 6) Click on information icon menu to know more about TagTap Multi Project on its GitHub repository.
